Hello

My name is John Colgrave and I am an IBM Senior Technical Staff Member at the Hursley Laboratory in the United Kingdom.

I work in the Messaging development organisation which is the team that produces IBM WebSphere MQ and IBM MessageSight.

I attended OSCON in 2013 and was inspired to set up a GitHub organization account to build a community around the IBM Messaging products. Please take a look at the ibm-messaging account and get involved in this community.
